name: @cep/csinterface
description: A CommonJS version of the Adobe-CEP/CEP-Resources CSInterface library

scripts.build: mkdir -p lib && touch lib/csinterface.js && cat src/csinterface.js > lib/csinterface.js && cat src/footer.js >> lib/csinterface.js && cp src/csinterface.d.ts lib/csinterface.d.ts
